column4: !question I have a hp zx500 pavillion on 7.04 - I am getting no sound - I have tried reinstalling the alsa trivers and my soundcard is detected via aplay -l : can anyone help me with this?
!question I have a hp zx500 pavillion on 7.04 - I am getting no sound - I have tried reinstalling the alsa trivers and my soundcard is detected via aplay -l : can anyone help me with this?
Amaranth - yep 100% (even tho i might be half deaf) - I cant hear anything at all
only problems ive had with sound on my laptops recently have been amixer settings. is launch alsamixer in terminal and adjust the volume and also unmute using < > keys worth a shot
